GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: accepts an object in the form { inc_votes: newVote } and updates the article's votes property. Responds with the updated article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the specified article

PATCH /api/comments/comment_id.description: accepts an object in the form { inc_votes: newVote } and updates the comment's votes property. Responds with the updated comment
